I managed to have a copy of the Mutant Genesis 2.0 in my hands yesterday and it took my breath away. The only reason why I didn't buy it despite being expensive was because the cover was a little torn and if I'm buying full price for a book it must be perfect. Anyway one of the thing that caught my attention was that in the very beggining of the book was a mention to Shatterstar and the Mojoverse, but there was no sign of this characters in the book since it only includes adjectiveless X-Men #1-7. WTF?!? Did Marvel change its mind after editing this edition? I think issues #8-11 were supposed to be there too, but for some reason it just isn't...
